titles.title: Why Do I Sing about Jesus?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Deep in my heart there's a gladness, Jesus has saved me from sin! Praise to His name, what a Saviour! Cleansing without and within.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Why do I sing about Jesus? Why is He precious to me? He is my Lord and my Saviour, Dying! He set me free!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Only a glimpse of His goodness, That was sufficient for me; Only one look at the Saviour, Then was my spirit set free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He is the fairest of fair ones, He is the Lily, the Rose; Rivers of mercy surround Him, Grace, love, and pity He shows.
